remarks: Membership of a subtraction mapping in a Euclidean space.  Deduction form of ~ eleesub .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Jul-2013.)
statement:
eleesubd.1 $e |- ( ph -> C = ( i e. ( 1 ... N ) |-> ( ( A ` i ) - ( B ` i ) ) ) ) $.
eleesubd $p |- ( ( ph /\ A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) ) -> C e. ( EE ` N ) ) $.
$d A i $.
$d B i $.
$d N i $.
